modName: Title Theme Replaced - One They Fear
summary: This simple sound mod replaces the main theme with \"One They Fear\".
descriptionHtml:
This simple sound mod replaces the main theme with \"One They Fear\".
You can hear this track as one of the two music tracks when fighting dragons. I just thought It sounded more epic than the original main theme, and it takes no time to start epically chanting, which is awesome. 

Cheers for Jeremy Soule, I eagerly look forward to his next game soundtrack.

==Installation==

I hardly doubt you need a tutorial if you\'ve been using mods for Skyrim before, but just in case, just drag the \"music\" folder into \"Data\" (if on XP or below), or just drag the whole \"Data\" folder into the root of Skyrim\'s directory and merge its contents (Vista and above).

v2: Added Increased Volume and Increased Volume+Fade In.

Let me know if the new files are making your ears bleed. :\\
author: jamesadalpiaz
